\documentclass[12pt]{article}

\usepackage{tikz}
\usetikzlibrary{backgrounds}

\begin{document}
\thispagestyle{empty}
\begin{center}
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1.25, background rectangle/.style={line width=4pt, draw=black}, show background rectangle]

  \draw (0,1) rectangle (3,2.5) node[pos=0.5] {\large Name};
  \draw[loosely dotted] (3.2,1.3) -- (10.8,1.3);
  \draw (3,1) rectangle (11,2.5);

  \draw (0,2.5) rectangle (3,4) node[pos=0.5] {\large Signature};
  \draw[loosely dotted] (3.2,2.8) -- (10.8,2.8);
  \draw (3,2.5) rectangle (11,4);

  \draw (0,4) rectangle (3,5) node[pos=0.5] {\large Section};
  \foreach \x in {0,...,2} {
    \draw (\x+3,4) rectangle (\x+4,5);
  }

  \draw (0,5) rectangle (3,6) node[pos=0.5] {\large Student number};
  \foreach \x in {0,...,7} {
    \draw (\x+3,5) rectangle (\x+4,6);
  }
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{center}

\end{document}
